education.description: It was a great journey of 2 yrs where i completed a project on protection of data storage in vmware enviroment through commvault and completed a research Journal on (Storage Safeguard Provacation in Cloud Computing .@ RASEM-2017)
That's the awsome life of 4 yrs along friend as well got an opportunity to intract with the lovely programming language like c , java, android and with some latest tech also like AWS
